Summary: I have a video of all six lights, looked like large glowing lights moving across the sky
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Milford
There was one other sighting in Milford on or around May 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home and noticed something strange right above me. i saw two bright lights that were moving in the same direction. i turned on the video on my phone and found a place to pull over. once i pulled over i realized there was at least six of them. all moving in the same direction. i managed to get all of them on video but them my phone cut out. someone else pulled over and witnessed it too but i have no idea who he was. i had my 8 year old with me, he saw them as well. was 9:00 at night in milford, pa on 5\19\12. you can check out the video if you look up you tube "weird lights in the sky, milford pa"
